LanguageData.SSVape_Regular.label: Vape (Regular)
LanguageData.SSVape_Regular.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf. It is slightly less harsh than a smokeleaf joint. Effects last about half a day.
LanguageData.SSVape_Fruity.label: Vape (Fruity)
LanguageData.SSVape_Fruity.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf. Less harsh than smoking smokeleaf joints. This vape has a distinctive fruity flavour. Effects last about half a day.
LanguageData.SSVape_Menthol.label: Vape (Menthol)
LanguageData.SSVape_Menthol.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf. Less harsh than smoking smokeleaf joints. This vape has a distinctive minty flavour. Effects last about half a day.
